page.title: 11Education Typical day
page.content: A typical menu for school dinners is as follows:- Salad, or Beefburgers with chips, or Sausage Rool with roast potatoes. We then have a sweet course which may be a choice of Ice cream in a wafer, or a milk drink and a biscuit, or fruit (an apple, an orange or a banana). Afternoon school starts at 1.10pm. Today we start with two periods of mathematics after which we have just a five minute break. We can go to the toilet at this time and then on to our last lesson for the day. The last lesson (two peroids) is science. In our First year at Holmfirth High School. Science is a combination of Biology, Chemistry and Physics. At 3.20pm the bell goes to signal the end of school for the day, and I catch a bus home.
